THE LEGEND OF PACQUAIO

About

Manny Pacquiao is a retired Filipino professional boxer and politician. He was born on December 17, 1978, in Kibawe, Bukidnon, Philippines. Pacquiao is widely regarded as one of the greatest boxers of all time. He is known for his incredible speed, power, and versatility in the ring.


Pacquiao began his professional boxing career in 1995 and quickly gained recognition for his exceptional boxing skills. He has won world titles in multiple weight classes, including flyweight, featherweight, lightweight, light welterweight, welterweight, and super welterweight. This accomplishment made him the first boxer in history to win world championships in eight different weight divisions.


Outside of boxing, Manny Pacquiao has been involved in politics. He was elected as a member of the Philippine House of Representatives in 2010 and later became a senator in 2016. His political career has been intertwined with his status as a national hero in the Philippines.
